TestDescription.name: Apache version older than 1.3.41

WASPDescription.DetailsFormat: The script has been tested with these parameter values : ${combinations}

TestDescription.Description:
[coolbox][dark]This alert was generated using only banner information. It may be a false positive. [/dark][/coolbox][break][bold]Security fixes in Apache version 1.3.41:[/bold][break][ul] [li]CVE-2007-6388 (cve.mitre.org) mod_status: Ensure refresh parameter is numeric to prevent a possible XSS attack caused by redirecting to other URLs. Reported by SecurityReason. [Mark Cox][/li]
[/ul]
[break][bold]Security fixes in Apache version 1.3.40:[/bold][break][ul] [li]CVE-2007-5000 (cve.mitre.org) mod_imap: Fix cross-site scripting issue. Reported by JPCERT. [Joe Orton][/li]
[li]CVE-2007-3847 (cve.mitre.org) mod_proxy: Prevent reading past the end of a buffer when parsing date-related headers. PR 41144. With Apache 1.3, the denial of service vulnerability applies only to the Windows and NetWare platforms. [Jeff Trawick][/li]
[/ul][break]
[navy]Affected Apache versions (up to 1.3.39).[/navy][break]
TestDescription.Impact: Check references for details about each vulnerability.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade Apache to the latest version.
